So delicious!! The service is great and menus are available in English and Spanish. The wait can be long (around 30-45minutes) during busier times.To get:Fried hot green peppers (like blistered shishito peppers) Camembert lollipop (warm Camembert cheese covered in some crushed nuts and with a raspberry drizzle)Papas bravas Huevos cobrealos (runny eggs on top of fried potato strips - it is SO amazing!!!)Calamari (very fresh, definitely not frozen and thawed)Serrano ham plateBottles of wine were great quality for the price. Definitely come when in Barcelona!!!
